channel.title: Postgres Changelog
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.title: Postgres.app 2.8.2
item.description:
• PostgreSQL 13.21 with PostGIS 3.1.12
  • PostgreSQL 14.18 with PostGIS 3.2.8
  • PostgreSQL 15.13 with PostGIS 3.3.8
  • PostgreSQL 16.9 with PostGIS 3.4.4
  • PostgreSQL 17.5 with PostGIS 3.5.2
  • PostgreSQL 18beta1 without PostGIS

You can find more info on the Github Releases Page.
